translations.text: By the sky full of constellations,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the witness and what is witnessed!<sup foot_note=77610>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ

translations.text: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ

translations.text: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama naqamoo minhum illa anyu/minoo billahi alAAazeezi alhameed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ

translations.text: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee lahu mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wallahu AAala kullishay-in shaheed
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ

translations.text: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena fatanoo almu/mineenawalmu/minati thumma lam yatooboo falahum AAathabujahannama walahum AAathabu alhareeq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

translations.text: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati lahum jannatuntajree min tahtiha al-anharu thalikaalfawzu alkabeer
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But Allah encompasses them from all sides.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, this is a glorious Quran,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
